titleStmt.title: Hornbyes hornbook Iudge not too rashly, till through all you looke; if nothing then doth please you, burne the booke. By William Hornbye, gent.
titleStmt.author: Hornby, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Math[ewes] for Thomas Bayly, and are to be sold at his shop in the middle row neere Staple Inn,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the middle row neere Staple Inn
